argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matplusgcell.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | matplusgcell.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |

| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_matvsca2 | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF .X. Y ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> ( I ( X .x. Y ) J ) = ( I ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF .X. Y ) J ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> ( I ( X .x. Y ) J ) = ( I ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF .X. Y ) J ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-ov | |- ( I ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF .X. Y ) J ) = ( ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF .X. Y ) ` <. I , J >. ) |
